question_sentence: The Government’s rescue deal for Flybe lets the ailing airline defer payment of a tax bill said to total how much?
Which artist has been chosen to record the title track for upcoming James Bond film No Time To Die?
According to new research, how did phosphorus, a key chemical component of all life on Earth, first arrive on our planet?
choices: Carried on comets from newborn stars

question_sentence: Democratic primary hopefuls Bernie Sanders and Elizabeth Warren have locked horns over claims that who said what?
choices: Warren said Sanders is rubbish at basketball
Sanders said a woman couldn’t win the presidency
Sanders said that he agrees with Donald Trump’s “America first” vision
Warren said the military intervention in Iran was a good idea

question_sentence: Japanese billionaire Yusaku Maezawa is looking for a partner to fly to the Moon with him on board which company’s rocket?
Which author came under fire for tweeting that diversity shouldn’t play a role in Oscar nominations?
How many pages long is the UK’s immigration rulebook?
Who features on a coin that has sold for a UK record-breaking £1m?
A Mexican man was hospitalised recently after taking viagra meant for bulls - but how long did the “effects” last?
What long-standing Tory pledge has the Government hinted could be scrapped?
choices: The four-hour waiting time target in A&E

question_sentence: The entire government of this country resigned this week, including the Prime Minister, after the President suggested making changes to the country’s constitution.
evidence: Russian Prime Minister Dmitry Medvedev and the entire Russian cabinet resigned after President Vladimir Putin proposed sweeping reforms that could help him hold onto power after his presidential term is up.

question_sentence: Democratic presidential candidates Elizabeth Warren and Bernie Sanders sparred after Warren claimed Sanders made what kind of controversial comment?
choices: That a woman couldn’t win the Presidency
That he was the only qualified candidate
That no Democrat could beat President Trump
That Hillary Clinton deserved to lose in 2016
evidence: Warren claims Sanders told her privately that he didn't believe a female candidate could win the presidential race. Sanders has roundly denied he said such a thing.

question_sentence: Which team won the College Football Playoff National Championship?
evidence: The LSU Tigers beat the Clemson Tigers to secure their first championship in the college football playoff era.

question_sentence: President Trump signed a new trade deal with China that the administration hopes will help what group of workers affected by the economic tensions between the two countries?
evidence: As part of the deal, Beijing has pledged to double its purchases from American farmers.

question_sentence: Fans of this rock band are furious that they were not included in the Rock & Roll Hall of Fame’s list of 2020 inductees
evidence: DMB fans wanted to know why the band was snubbed even though they pulled in more than 1 million fan votes.

question_sentence: The House finally handed the impeachment articles over to the Senate, which means the impeachment trial of President Trump will soon officially be underway. Who will preside over the trial?
choices: Speaker of the House Nancy Pelosi
Supreme Court Chief Justice John Roberts
evidence: Supreme Court Chief Justice was sworn in days before the trial and will oversee the proceedings.

question_sentence: Though the conversation about last week’s downing of Ukrainian International Airlines Flight 752 has mostly focused on the United States, Ukraine and the US, this country is also mourning after losing 63 citizens in the crash.
evidence: Sixty-three Canadians were on board the flight. Many of these were Iranian Canadians traveling to Canada via the Ukraine.

question_sentence: The White House is considering diverting $7.2 billion in Pentagon funding to bolster what controversial project?
choices: A new military base in the Middle East
evidence: The $7.2 billion would go toward completing about 885 miles of new fencing at the southern border in the next few years.

question_sentence: The World Health Organization released a list of urgent health challenges the world is likely to face in the coming decade. What was one of the top challenges it highlighted?
evidence: Climate change as a health problem was one of the top items on the WHO’s list. The effects of climate change could include more air pollution, dangerous weather patterns and other factors that could increase disease and injury.

question_sentence: The New York Public Library revealed its most checked-out book of all time. What is it?
evidence: “The Snowy Day,” by Ezra Jack Keats, topped the list. (The other options for this answer were also among the NYPL’s most checked-out selections.)
